backend/AltSignup.mo: Provides a simple signup handler with basic empty-field validation and simulated success response.
backend/main.mo: Actor manages user profiles with permission checks using AccessControl and stores profiles in a Principal-keyed map.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend project files.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry loading fonts, configuring II_URL, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/public/.well-known/ii-alternati: Specifies allowed Internet Identity alternative origins.
frontend/public/404.html: Fallback page that redirects unknown routes to index.html for SPA routing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with root layout and routes for signup, login, onboarding, and feature pages.
frontend/src/auth/iiConfig.ts: Provides shared configuration helpers for creating and logging in AuthClient instances using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthDiagnos: Debug panel displaying Internet Identity auth state, timing, platform info, and stall detection.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthErrorPa: Reusable error UI component with message display and optional retry or navigation actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthPopupHe: Inline help panel guiding users when the Internet Identity popup is blocked, offering retry and a direct II link.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthStatusB: Persistent auth status banner showing step progress, timing, outcomes, and retry/direct II actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/CanisterWar: Displays backend warmup status with warming, ready, and failure states plus retry support.
frontend/src/components/auth/InternetIde: Handles II authorize callbacks and redirects users based on onboarding completion.
frontend/src/components/auth/PatchedInte: Fetches dynamic II config and wraps children with a configured InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/components/auth/UsernamePas: Empty placeholder file for a username/password auth form.
frontend/src/components/RootLayout.tsx: Wraps app routes with onboarding context and II authorization callback handler.
frontend/src/components/TaskModal.tsx: Modal with timer controls for completing a task, including countdown, pause, resume, and confirmation prompts.
frontend/src/config/ai.ts: Deprecated AI config stub returning empty defaults and warning to use the proxy instead.
frontend/src/contexts/OnboardingResultCo: Context for storing, persisting, and clearing onboarding results using localStorage with hydration safety.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the II identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthAttemptGuard.t: Manages a guarded auth-attempt lifecycle with timestamps, correlation IDs, and reset capability.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthFlowDiagnostic: Tracks detailed auth-flow steps, timings, slow-step detection, and terminal outcomes with correlation IDs.
frontend/src/hooks/useCanisterWarmup.ts: Provides a warmup hook that immediately marks the canister as ready and supports optional auto-start and manual retry.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity restoration, login flow, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentitySi: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useMobileInternetIden: Implements mobile‑safe Internet Identity login with pre-initialized AuthClient and detailed outcome handling.
Mobile II login hook using shared config for AuthClient initialization and consistent login behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/usePasswordIdentity.t: Manages username/password-based identity with storage, restoration, and provider-based access.
frontend/src/hooks/usePostAuthTimeout.ts: Runs timeout tracking for post-auth phases and exposes timeout state, elapsed time, and reset logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useStalledAuthDetecti: Detects stalls in the auth pipeline using step-based timeouts and reports stall state, timing, and reason.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and a custom chocolate-themed OKLCH color system with typography and utility overrides.
frontend/src/lib/aiClient.ts: Legacy AI client stub that throws an error and should not be used.
frontend/src/lib/aiProxyClient.ts: Implements the AI proxy client with request/response types, validation, error handling, and helpers for calling external AI endpoints.
frontend/src/lib/onboardingPlaceholder.t: Provides storage key plus safe JSON parse and stringify helpers for persisted onboarding data.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Daily.tsx: Displays daily tasks generated by the AI proxy, handling loading, errors, and task modal interactions.
frontend/src/pages/Fridge.tsx: Shows hardcoded chocolate inventory by period with UI controls to switch views.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page with hero section, feature carousel modal, and navigation buttons for signup/login.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Implements a complex Internet Identity login flow with validation, timeouts, diagnostics, stalled-state detection, and mobile-patched login handling.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: Guides authenticated users through a multi-step onboarding form, calls an AI API to generate a plan, and stores the result in context.
frontend/src/pages/Signup.tsx: Handles the signup authentication flow using Internet Identity with validation, diagnostics, timeouts, and mobile-friendly login logic.
frontend/src/pages/SignupTest.tsx: Provides a simplified backup signup page that triggers Internet Identity login and redirects to onboarding when authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/SweetSummit.tsx: Displays the user's generated onboarding plan and allows navigating back to onboarding if missing.
frontend/src/pages/WeeklyMountain.tsx: Generates or loads a weekly mountain plan based on onboarding data, caches it per week, and handles errors and onboarding resets.
frontend/src/utils/authDiagnostics.ts: Provides types and helpers for tracking auth steps, generating correlation IDs, and logging step transitions, outcomes, and warnings.
frontend/src/utils/identityValidation.ts: Validates identities by checking anonymity and delegation validity and determines whether a session is stale.
frontend/src/utils/passwordIdentity.ts: Creates deterministic Ed25519 identities from credentials and provides functions to store, restore, and clear them from localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/platform.ts: Detects Chrome on Android and caches platform info for mobile-specific auth logic.
frontend/src/utils/safeRender.ts: Converts unknown values into safe strings for React rendering and offers fallback and string‑extraction utilities.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles URL parameter parsing, session persistence, and safe removal of parameters from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending fonts, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes current project state and requirements, emphasizing a fresh Internet Identity login flow with onboarding routing.
